com.mumfrey.liteloader.messaging

Class MessageBus

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mumfrey.liteloader.messaging.MessageBus
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InterfaceProvider

    public final class MessageBus
extends java.lang.Object
implements InterfaceProvider
    Intra-mod messaging bus, allows mods to send arbitrary notifications to each other without having to create an explicit dependency or resort to reflection
    Author:
    Adam Mummery-Smith
